Texts.CHs:
从陨落中孕育出来的共生体。有知觉，韧性十足而罕见的种族，他们挣扎着要解决他们来自何处的问题。

^orange;食性^reset;: 杂食性

^orange;天赋^reset;:
  坠落上海 x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^green;抗性^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% 毒素抗性, +^cyan;10^reset;% 辐射抗性, +^cyan;4^reset;% 电系抗性, +^cyan;3^reset;% 射线抗性
  +^green;1^reset;% HP回复 (持续)
  科技: ^green;粘液球, 爬墙^reset;
  ^cyan;免疫^reset;: 粘液弹性, 粘液减速, 中毒, 蛛网

^orange;环境^reset;:
  粘液, 沼泽和湿地生物群落。 HP x^green;1.25^reset;, +^green;15^reset;% 速度
  寒冷生物群落: HP x^red;0.75^reset;
  可在液态粘液中呼吸

^orange;武器^reset;:
  鞭系专精:  x^green;15^reset;%
  生物武器: 伤害 x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;%^reset; 暴击伤害

^red;弱点^reset;:
  ^red;抗性^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% 火炎 & 寒气抗性
  +^red;25^reset;% 饥饿速率
Texts.Eng:
Symbiotes birthed from the fallen. Sentient. An unusual and resilient people who struggle to come to grips with where they came from.

^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Fall Damage x^green;0.5^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^cyan;30^reset;% Poison, +^cyan;10^reset;% Radioactive, +^cyan;4^reset;% Electric, +^cyan;3^reset;% Cosmic
  +^green;1^reset;% Health Regen (Constant)
  Tech: ^green;Sticky ball, Wall Grab^reset;
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Slime Bounce, Slime Stick, Poison, Webs

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Gelatinous, Bog and Swamp biomes: Health x^green;1.25^reset; and +^green;15^reset;% Speed
  Cold biomes: Health x^red;0.75^reset;
  Can breathe in liquid slime

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Whip Mastery:  x^green;15^reset;%
  Bioweapon: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;, +^green;20^reset;%^reset; Crit Damage

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;20^reset;% Fire & Ice
  +^red;25^reset;% Hunger Drain
